import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';// Import translation files
import enTranslations from'./locales/en.json';import deTranslations from'./locales/de.json';const resources={en:{translation:enTranslations},de:{translation:deTranslations}};i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({resources,fallbackLng:'en',debug:false,detection:{order:['localStorage','navigator','htmlTag'],caches:['localStorage']},interpolation:{escapeValue:false},react:{useSuspense:false}});export default i18n;
